title: [Hollowlair, Den of the Fiend]
description: Channels burrowed into the walls, floor, and ceiling of the chamber house black marble tentacles, carved and barbed with razern.  The entire room appears caught within the Ur-Daemon's grasp, with Marlu's form looming over it.  Manacled and shackled chains line the walls, are mounted to the ceiling and floor, which is marked by a series of drains.  From the horrific stench, undoubtedly a result of the fetid and festering flesh on the restraints and clogging the drains, there seems to be no escape other than a barbed stone door.
